prompts: Create a powerful Pokemon that harnesses the energy of light and shadows.
I want a mythical creature with a dazzling golden mane and sharp black claws.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that can bend light into different forms.
Make a unique Pokemon that has an elegant yet intimidating design.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in diverse habitats, from mountains to urban areas.
Design a creature that embodies both beauty and strength with radiant colors.
Give me a Pokemon that has a striking contrast of colors and a majestic presence.
